workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.16969903052755392 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.45965856162354707 --weight-decay 0.00021799548247602318 --lr 1e-9 --lr-scheduler triangular --min-lr 1e-10 --max-lr 0.0003837947029562916 --lr-period-updates 121701.24362256593 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.09602194321144551 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
